body_content.explanation: having a surface that is not smooth but has a raised pattern:
examples: The hallway has textured wallpaper.
She uses a lot of textured fabrics such as tweed and corduroy.
The textured surface of the handle makes it easier to grip.

body_content.explanation: (of hair) curly or slightly curly rather than straight:
examples: Textured hair can be more time-consuming to take care of than straight hair.

body_content.explanation: (of hair) cut or styled (= arranged) so that it has shape and does not lie flat:
examples: Ask your hairdresser to add some textured layers for body and fullness.
Drying the hair roughly can give it a more textured and modern look.

body_content.explanation: (of paint) containing something such as sand so that the surface it is used on is not completely smooth:
examples: The outside walls are painted with a textured masonry paint.
The textured coating should last for 10 years or more.

body_content.explanation: (of food) containing thick or hard parts rather than being completely smooth:
examples: Blend the ingredients until they are well combined but still a little textured.
Granita is granular and textured, and much less smooth than sorbet.

body_content.explanation: (of food or drink) having an interesting taste because of containing several different flavours at the same time:
examples: This is a delicious textured wine.
Nothing beats the richly textured flavours of this dish.

body_content.explanation: (of a computer object) having had a pattern or image added to it to make it look more real:
examples: A simple textured sphere is the standard object for graphics demos.
16Mb of RAM is the minimum you will need for handling textured 3-D data.

body_content.explanation: (of music) combining different parts, instruments, etc. to form an interesting sound:
examples: The music is richly textured.
I love the rich, textured sound you get in a larger orchestra.

body_content.explanation: interesting or important because of having many different qualities:
examples: It is an extremely rich and textured film.
This is a valuable and textured piece of analysis.
The Miami depicted in the media is almost nothing like the more textured and complicated Miami that I know.

body_content.explanation: having a texture of the stated type:
examples: coarse-textured
